msbt.message: Well, if it isn't ! Hey! I'm making a fresh start on .I thought I'd kick off with an unpacking routine, but these boxes are totally kicking my glutes!Ah well! This is the first day of a new . Expect big, new, muscular things, !

Yo! ! Just had to visit me on , eh?I knew you were a big fan, but I didn't know how big until just now!I feel like a boxer entering an arena, and my entourage is marching in with me. Yeah, ! You're my entourage!
Oh! Is that you, ?It's me! ! I moved in today!Running into you just after moving hereit's like our muscles were calling to each other, y'know?Hey, wanna start a workout club here on the island, ?

Oh wow! It's !It's me, ! How you been, ?Great running into you! I just moved to the island. Well, actually I swam here, dragging all my stuff.If you ever need a workout buddy, let me know. Just don't be late!
